__comment: Contains all cauldron and vial data. Use itemNames.json to map material names to their display names. In descriptions, `_` is a placeholder for the current power. `algorithm` is the function used by the game to calculate power based on powerPerLevel and current level.

orange.name: ROID_RAGIN
orange.description: +_ Total STR. 'Total' here means that, for example, a +10% STR bonus from something else wouldn't affect this bonus.

orange.name: WARRIORS_RULE
orange.description: All Orange Passive Bubbles, which are the smaller sized ones, give a _x higher bonus to your warrior-based classes.

orange.name: HEARTY_DIGGY
orange.description: +_% mining efficiency per power of 10 max HP that your character has. The perfect bonus for miners with infinite HP!

orange.name: WYOMING_BLOOD
orange.description: Multi-Ore mining chance is increased by +_%, and your max Multi-Ore chance is 300% instead of 100%.

orange.name: REELY_SMART
orange.description: +_% Mining and Fishing EXP gain. Y'know what, I'll even DOUBLE that bonus for whichever skill has the lower level!

orange.name: BIG_MEATY_CLAWS
orange.description: Increases base damage by +$. This bonus increases based on how much Max HP you have above 250.

orange.name: SPLOOSH_SPLOOSH
orange.description: Multi-Fish fishing chance is increased by +_%, and your max Multi-Fish chance is 300% instead of 100%.

orange.name: STRONK_TOOLS
orange.description: The following tools give +_% more skilling Power than normal: $

orange.name: FMJ
orange.description: +_% more defence from Equipment. Also, +1 base Def per Class LV, up to +_.

orange.name: BAPPITY_BOOPITY
orange.description: +_% critical Damage. Badabing, badaboom! Or in Italian, Babadabinga, babadaboomahh!

orange.name: BRITTLEY_SPEARS
orange.description: +_% Total damage. This multiplies with other damage bonuses, but adds with the other '+% Total Damage' bubbles.

orange.name: CALL_ME_BOB
orange.description: +_% Construction EXP Gain. Also gives +50% Bug-Fixing speed if your username is LavaFlame2. Actually, better make that +500%...

orange.name: BUFF_BOI_TALENT
orange.description: +_ Talent Points for EACH tab! Yea, it's amazing right? But it's just for warriors, don't tell the other classes!!

orange.name: ORANGE_BARGAIN
orange.description: The material costs of ALL orange bubbles are _% lower

green.name: SWIFT_STEPPIN
green.description: +_ Total AGI. Probably the lamest of the five stats... err, I mean four, hehe.

green.name: ARCHER_OR_BUST
green.description: All Green Passive Bonuses, which are the smaller sized ones, give _x more bonuses to your archer-based characters.

green.name: HAMMER_HAMMER
green.description: You can now produce +1 more items at once in the anvil, and your production speed is increased by _%.

green.name: LIL_BIG_DAMAGE
green.description: +_% Mastery. Mastery is your stat that boosts minimum damage. Just like in Maplest... err, just like how I thought it up myself!

green.name: ANVILNOMICS
green.description: Costs for buying Anvil Production Points is reduced by _%. This is just like a tax cut, so remember me as a hero!

green.name: QUICK_SLAP
green.description: Increases base damage by +$. This bonus increases based on how much Movement Speed you have above 110%.

green.name: SANIC_TOOLS
green.description: The following tools give +_% more skilling Power than normal: $

green.name: BUG]
green.description: Multi-Bug catching chance is increased by +_%, and your max Multi-Bug chance is 300% instead of 100%.

green.name: SHAQURACY
green.description: Your secondary stat (WIS for warrior, STR for archer, AGI for mage) gives +_% more Accuracy than normal.

green.name: CHEAP_SHOT
green.description: +_% critical Chance, as it increases the chance for your attack to hit the monster's privates, and for the monster to be male.

green.name: BOW_JACK
green.description: +_% Total damage. This multiplies with other damage bonuses, but adds with the other '+% Total Damage' bubbles.

green.name: CUZ_I_CATCH_EM_ALL
green.description: _x more likely to catch shiny critters when opening a trap.

green.name: FAST_BOI_TALENT
green.description: +_ Talent Points for EACH tab, but just for Archers! Well, and 'that' class, you know who you are!

green.name: GREEN_BARGAIN
green.description: The material costs of ALL green bubbles are _% lower

purple.name: STABLE_JENIUS
purple.description: +_ Total WIS. Honesty the greatest bonus in any Idle Game, believe me. Absolutely incredible, everyone says so!

purple.name: MAGE_IS_BEST
purple.description: All Purple Passive Bonuses, which are the smaller sized ones, give _x more bonuses to your mage-based characters.

purple.name: HOCUS_CHOPPUS
purple.description: +_% choppin efficiency per power of 10 max MP that your character has. Super diaper! Err, duper.

purple.name: MOLTO_LOGGO
purple.description: Multi-Log chop chance is increased by +_%, and your max Multi-Log chance is now 300% instead of 100%.

purple.name: NOODUBBLE
purple.description: +_% Choppin' and Alchemy EXP gain. Y'know what, I'll even... actually, never mind.

purple.name: NAME_I_GUESS
purple.description: Increases base damage by +$. This bonus increases based on how much Max MP you have above 150.

purple.name: LE_BRAIN_TOOLS
purple.description: The following tools give +_% more skilling Power than normal: $

purple.name: COOKIN_ROADKILL
purple.description: Cranium Cooking lasts _% longer, gives _% more progress per kill, and has a _% lower cooldown. Also +_% Alchemy EXP!

purple.name: BREWSTACHIO
purple.description: +_% Brew Speed. This a multiplicative bonus, which means its ultra powerful, all the time! Even on Mondays, the worst day!

purple.name: ALL_FOR_KILL
purple.description: Attack Talents give +_% higher bonuses to Offline Gains than they normally do. So you might as well just AFK forever, bye!

purple.name: MATTY_STAFFORD
purple.description: +_% Total damage. This multiplies with other damage bonuses, but adds with the other '+% Total Damage' bubbles.

purple.name: CALL_ME_POPE
purple.description: _x Worship Charge rate per hour. Also, _x Max Worship Charge! You bouta go super with all that charge... just sayin'

purple.name: GOSPEL_LEADER
purple.description: +_% Max Charge per 10 Worship levels. I guess you could say this upgrade doesn't come Free of Charge!

purple.name: SMART_BOI_TALENT
purple.description: Sorry, mages don't get anything because you're lame.... Ok fine, you can have +_ Talent Points for each tab, but I'm not happy about it.

purple.name: PURPLE_BARGAIN
purple.description: The material costs of ALL purple bubbles are _% lower

yellow.name: LOTTO_SKILLS
yellow.description: +_ LUK. Also, this will increase your chances of winning the lottery in real life from 0.0% to 0.000%! I'm not even joking, it's true!!

yellow.name: DROPPIN_LOADS
yellow.description: +_% Drop Rate. Thanks to this upgrade, you can get even MORE angry when you keep not getting that rare pet drop from the boss!

yellow.name: STARTUE_EXP
yellow.description: Leveling up a statue resets it's exp bar down to _%, instead of 0%. Staturrific! Yea... the jokes are only gonna go downhill from here lol

yellow.name: LEVEL_UP_GIFT
yellow.description: Whenever you level up anything, _% chance to drop a gift! It could be an EXP balloon, a Gem for the gem shop, or something crazy weird!

yellow.name: PROWESESSARY
yellow.description: The Prowess Bonus for every skill is multiplied by _. Prowess lowers the Efficiency needed to get multiple QTY per drop from resources.

yellow.name: STAMP_TRAMP
yellow.description: Increases the Max Lv of the 'Toilet Paper Postage' Talent to _. You can unlock this talent by typing 'More like Poopy Pete' near Pete.

yellow.name: UNDEVELOPED_COSTS
yellow.description: Reduces the material costs of all Alchemy Bubbles by _%. They are just bubbles though, how much could they even cost? 10 dollars?

yellow.name: DA_DAILY_DRIP
yellow.description: Increases the Max Cap for every liquid by +$. This bonus increases based on the combined Alchemy LV of all your characters!

yellow.name: GRIND_TIME
yellow.description: +_% Class EXP. The go-to active bubble for anyone who wants to reach max level faster and finally start playing the game!

yellow.name: LAAARRRRYYYY
yellow.description: Every time you upgrade an Alchemy bubble, there's a _% chance it'll upgrade 2 times, for no extra cost! Two fer one, getter dun!

yellow.name: COGS_FOR_HANDS
yellow.description: +_% Cog Production speed. Cogs are great. I really really like cogs. I guess you could say I think they're pretty Coggers...

yellow.name: SAMPLE_IT
yellow.description: +_% Sample Size when taking samples for the 3d printer. Finally, your statisitcal analysis will be accurate!

yellow.name: BIG_GAME_HUNTER
yellow.description: Each time a Giant Monster spawns, the chance for another Giant Monster in that same week goes down by _% less than normal.

yellow.name: IGNORE_OVERDUES
yellow.description: +_% Book Checkout speed, thanks to this one little bubble that librarians do NOT want you to know about!

yellow.name: YELLOW_BARGAIN
yellow.description: The material costs of ALL yellow bubbles are _% lower.

vials.name: COPPER_CORONA
vials.description: Orange bubble cauldron brew speed is increased by +_%

vials.name: SIPPY_SPLINTERS
vials.description: Green bubble cauldron brew speed is increased by +_%

vials.name: MUSHROOM_SOUP
vials.description: Yellow cauldron brew speed is increased by +_%

vials.name: SPOOL_SPRITE
vials.description: Purple cauldron brew speed is increased by +_%

vials.name: BARIUM_MIXTURE
vials.description: +_ Water Droplet max capacity. Thats the 1st liquid type in Alchemy, btw.

vials.name: DIETER_DRINK
vials.description: Monsters drop +_% more money.

vials.name: SKINNY_0_CAL
vials.description: +_% chance to get double points when depositing statues. So like... if you deposit one statue, it might count as one! Or two.

vials.name: THUMB_POW
vials.description: When converting Skill EXP into Class EXP using the 'EXP CONVERTER' star talent, you'll get _% more Class EXP than you usually do.

vials.name: JUNGLE_JUICE
vials.description: +_% liquid regen rate for all liquid cauldrons. Yes, even the secret one!

vials.name: BARLEY_BREW
vials.description: Alchemy bubble upgrade costs are _% lower for all bubbles! Even the giraffe bubbles that look strangely like elephants!

vials.name: ANEARFUL
vials.description: +_% Card drop rate. Even works offline, just like it always has! What do you mean this used to say something different...?

vials.name: TEA_WITH_PEA
vials.description: +_ Liquid Nitrogen max capacity. Thats the 2nd liquid type in Alchemy, btw.

vials.name: GOLD_GUZZLE
vials.description: +_% Shop sell price.

vials.name: RAMIFICOCTION
vials.description: +_ Talent Points for Tab 1. Shout out to that 1 person who'll make it this far without knowing what talents are, you're my hero!

vials.name: SEAWATER
vials.description: +_% chance for 1 kill to count for 2 when trying to open new portals, but only while actively playing. One, two, buckle my shoe.

vials.name: TAIL_TIME
vials.description: +_ Weapon Power. This is gonna be OP in later worlds I can already tell.

vials.name: FLY_IN_MY_DRINK
vials.description: Eww go get me another one, I can't drink this! ...what, why are you looking at me like that? OH right, uh, this gives +_ base Accuracy.

vials.name: MIMICRAUGHT
vials.description: +_% EXP from monsters. Sorry, I know this is a lame bonus. Send me an email if you want me change it to +_% NPC dialogue talking speed.

vials.name: BLUE_FLAV
vials.description: -_% material cost for stamps. You know how it's hard to increase stamps max levels? Well this kinda makes that a bit less factual!

vials.name: SLUG_SLURP
vials.description: +_ Post Office Box Points for every character, and easily the best bonus in the game. A box will never abandon you!

vials.name: PICKLE_JAR
vials.description: +_% Nothing. Absolutely nothing, now and forever. It's a darn pickle, what were you expecting?

vials.name: FUR_REFRESHER
vials.description: +_% higher Shiny Critter chance. This is a multiplier, so +1% from this vial means 1.01x, so 5% shiny chance would go to 5.05%.

vials.name: SIPPY_SOUL
vials.description: +_ Talent Points for Tab 2.

vials.name: CRAB_JUICE
vials.description: +_ Starting points in Worship Tower Defence. Of course, a true balloon monkey wouldn't accept handouts like this.

vials.name: VOID_VIAL
vials.description: +_% Mining Efficiency.

vials.name: RED_MALT
vials.description: +_% Refinery Cycle Speed. I just want to see you squirm a bit more as you decide where to spend your precious salts hahahaha!!

vials.name: EW_GROSS_GROSS
vials.description: +_% Catching Efficiency.

vials.name: THE_SPANISH_SAHARA
vials.description: +_% Choppin Efficiency.

vials.name: POISON_TINCTURE
vials.description: Eagle Eye Trap-O-Vision gives +_% more critters. It will always give less than if you manually collected the traps though.

vials.name: ETRUSCAN_LAGER
vials.description: +_% Fishing Efficiency.

vials.name: CHONKER_CHUG
vials.description: +_% Talent Book Library checkout speed.

vials.name: BUBONIC_BURP
vials.description: +_ Cog Inventory spaces. DONT PANIC!!! I KNOW HOW ALARMING IT IS THAT A VIAL FINALLY GIVES A USEFUL BONUS FOR ONCE, BUT STAY CALM!

vials.name: VISIBLE_INK
vials.description: +_% Construction Exp gain.

vials.name: ORANGE_MALT
vials.description: +_% higher Shiny Critter chance. This stacks with the shiny chance from the Fur Refresher vial. You see, they have the same shaped vial.

vials.name: SNOW_SLURRY
vials.description: +_% Printer sample size. My my there are a lot of these 'sample size' bonuses in the game... too many...

vials.name: SLOWERGY_DRINK
vials.description: +_% Base Multikill per Multikill Tier for all worlds. Stack them skulls!

vials.name: SIPPY_CUP
vials.description: +_% Cog production speed.

vials.name: BUNNY_BREW
vials.description: +_ Talent Points for Tab 3.

vials.name: 40-40_PURITY
vials.description: +_ Trench Seawater max capacity. Thats the 3rd liquid type in Alchemy, btw.

vials.name: SPOOK_PINT
vials.description: +_% base Giant Monster spawn rate.

vials.name: GOOSEY_GLUG
vials.description: +_ base critter per trap. This is a sHONKingly good bonus, the only one of its kind!

vials.name: BALL_PICKLE_JAR
vials.description: +_% arcade ball gain rate, and those are balls blessed by Balljoepickle himself, so you know they're extra lucky!
